name: Sanguine Sonata
description:
What is Sanguine Sonata?

Sanguine Sonata is a casual experience in which you struggle

with the balance between life and death, touching the heart of

a stranger. Caress and whisper into your android device to still

the heart and save a life.

If you take the time to play with Sanguine Sonata, I would love to hear back from you. What you think, how it played, what we can do to improve it, and any other general feedback/criticism. Thanks for checking it out!
